sentences.en: After a while he started to doze.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,他便鼾声大作了.

sentences.en: After lunch I had a doze.
sentences.cn: 吃过午饭，我小睡了会儿。

sentences.en: As she was about to doze off, Chun Bao woke up.
sentences.cn: 等她朦朦胧胧地刚离开思索将要睡去, 春宝又醒了.

sentences.en: Grandad was dozing in his chair.
He fell into a doze, ie began to doze.
He likes ( to have ) a doze after dinner.
He likes ( to have ) a doze after lunch.
I began to doze off and pulled myself up sharp.
sentences.cn: 我开始迷迷糊糊睡去了,立刻又惊醒过来.

sentences.en: I had a doze on the train.
sentences.cn: 我在火车上打了个盹儿。

sentences.en: In one room, young mothers weave while babies doze in their laps.
sentences.cn: 在一间屋子里，年轻的母亲们在织布，而她们的孩子就在她们膝上打盹。

sentences.en: Some students often doze off in class.
sentences.cn: 有些学生常在课堂上打瞌睡.

sentences.en: The hoarse messenger had dropped into a doze.
sentences.cn: 这粗鲁的信差已经沉入昏睡之中.

sentences.en: The swish of the tyres lulled him into a light doze.
sentences.cn: 车轮呼呼地转着，他不一会儿便打起瞌睡来。

sentences.en: There's nothing like a little doze after lunch.
sentences.cn: 午饭后打一会儿盹是最适意不过了.

sentences.en: While the adults doze, the young play.
sentences.cn: 大人们在打瞌睡, 而孩子们在玩耍.

sentences.en: With the shutters half-closed and the calm airy height of the room to lull me, I soon fell into a doze.
sentences.cn: 半掩的百叶窗和宁静、通风的高大房间催我入睡，我很快便打起盹来。

trans.tran_en: to sleep lightly for a short time
to sleep lightly for a short time
to sleep lightly for a short time
